EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.Confirm - Melbourne
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Melbourne
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Big Data Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/melbourne> in Melbourne. Please find the event details below:
Date: July 7, 2015 Time: Check-In begins @ 8:15AM / Session #1 begins @ 8:30AM / Session #2 begins @ 9:45AM / Session #3 begins @ 11:15 / Session #4 begins @ 1:00PM Location: Cliftons Melbourne Level 1, 440 Collins St, Melbourne
{{my.Save the Date - Melbourne:default=edit me}}
To fully participate in the hands-on workshop, please bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <"mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
